Pre-Game Insights: India is riding high on a 47-run victory over AFG and is eyeing a fifth consecutive win in T20 World Cup meetings against BAN
Leading the charge are the formidable duo of Rohit Sharma (454 runs) and Yuzvendra Chahal (9 wickets)
Others: The match is scheduled for Saturday, June 22, 2024, at 8 pm IST at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, North Sound, Antigua
